aboutSection.name: About
aboutSection.content:
Back in 2020, I began my journey into web development by creating a site using Webflow. This initial project sparked my interest in coding and web development, leading me to further explore the field. Since then, I’ve had the opportunity to work both as a freelancer and within the IT department of an e-commerce company.

Currently, I work as a pre-middle developer, focusing on building scalable web applications. I enjoy creating solutions that are not only robust and efficient but also user-friendly and accessible.

Outside of work, I enjoy reading, traveling, riding my bike, snowboarding, watching movies, and spending time with family and friends. I'm also passionate about exploring new technologies and development opportunities, always looking to expand my skill set and stay at the forefront of the industry.

companies.content: As a freelancer at BHub, I continue to build web solutions using Javascript and PHP. I use tools like Tilda, Webflow, ManyChat, and Shopify to deliver projects efficiently. Details are provided below.

At BusinessHub, I developed web applications using Javascript, PHP, HTML, CSS, and React. I also worked with platforms like Tilda, Webflow, ManyChat, and Shopify to create custom web solutions. Additionally, I optimized Facebook Ads and managed contractors to ensure projects success.

During my time freelancing on platforms like Fiverr and Kwork, I focused on using HTML, CSS, and Javascript to create customized websites. I built and fine-tuned these sites to ensure they worked smoothly, handling everything from essential components to overall functionality across various projects.

commercial.title: GummiMi Store
commercial.content: Crafted a visually captivating Shopify site for Gummimi's Hemp Gummies, emphasizing meticulous design and graphics. Successfully implemented a unique brand identity, enhancing user engagement and driving sales through an immersive online experience.

commercial.title: Road App
commercial.content: Contributed to the development of a dorm-management system using React. Implemented feature slices design and feature flags. The app supports internationalization, themes, and role-based access, with switchable designs via the admin panel. Used for learning and experimenting with various technologies.

commercial.title: BHub Info
commercial.content: Built a WordPress site for BHub using JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, and jQuery. The project aimed to boost Bhub’s online presence, highlighting the company’s key features and technology with a user-friendly and engaging design

commercial.title: Remedial Pax Store
commercial.content: Developed a Shopify store specializing in Remedial Pax creams and serums. Integrated custom widgets and add-ons to enhance user experience and streamline product selection, providing a seamless shopping journey.

pet.title: Search Movies App by TMDB
pet.content: Created a web app using TypeScript, React, React Query, React Router Dom, Axios, and Mantine, allowing users to browse and pick movies effortlessly, leveraging modern technologies for a smooth, user-friendly experience.

pet.title: Discord Clone App
pet.content: Developed a Discord Clone app using Next.js, TypeScript, React, React Query, Socket.io, Tailwind, Shadcn/ui, ORM - Prisma, MySQL, Uploadthing, Clerk, and LiveKit. Enabled users to chat and connect seamlessly, leveraging a robust tech stack for a modern experience.

pet.title: Choice App: Decision Support
pet.content: Built the Choice app using TypeScript, React, React Router Dom, and Tailwind CSS, allowing users to make selections effortlessly, leveraging modern technologies for a streamlined and intuitive experience.

pet.title: Super Mario Clone
pet.content: Developed a web-based Super Mario Clone using Kaboom, blending classic gameplay with modern web technologies for an engaging experience.

main.footer: Coded in Visual Studio Code. Built with Preact and Tailwind CSS for a seamless user experience. All text is set in the Poppins and Montserrat typeface. Deployed on a VPS with Docker .
